org.pepstock.charba.client.data

Class DoughnutDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.Dataset
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.HovingFlexDataset
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.HovingDataset
            • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.PieDataset
              • org.pepstock.charba.client.data.DoughnutDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasDataset

    public class DoughnutDataset
extends PieDataset
    The doughnut chart allows a number of properties to be specified for each dataset. These are used to set display properties for a specific dataset.
    Is equals of Pie dataset.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
